title: How does Keyword Magic Tool work?
content:
Keyword Magic Tool
Try Keyword Magic Tool

The Keyword Magic Tool is the most powerful keyword research tool on Semrush. It offers you access to an extended database with over 25.5 billion keywords and a streamlined interface for organizing research on the go. Enter a single word or phrase into the search bar, and you will receive a responsive table with related search terms broken down into topic-specific subgroups. 

Extended keyword database with global keyword research possibilities
Total volume and average difficulty automatically calculated for your entire table of target keywords
Automatic grouping of target keywords into subgroups by topic
Questions-only filter to find keywords that ask questions
Info on which SERP Features are present on each keyword’s results page
Built-in filtering, sorting, and difficulty analysis to facilitate the complete keyword research process
Ability to organize your lists of queries for different projects/websites you’re working on
Customized approach to keyword evaluation, catering specifically to your domain with AI-powered tools
Why should you use this tool?
Keyword Magic Tool Reports and Features
